data.comment: The first-half is under way at Staaien - St. Truidense kick-off to start the match.
Goal! Pol Garcia gives St. Truidense a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 29, Dries Wuytens for Waasland-Beveren has been booked by Wesley Alen and receives a first yellow card.
The first-half is over at Staaien.
At Staaien, Samuel Asamoah has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Sint- Truiden - Waasland-Beveren with the kick-off.
St. Truidense make their first substitution with Facundo Colidio replacing Oleksandr Filippov.
The away team replace Alessandro Albanese with Serge Leuko.
In the minute 67, Denzel Jubitana is on a sub for Georges Mandjeck for Waasland-Beveren.
Facundo Colidio (St. Truidense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Seung-Woo Lee is replacing Yuma Suzuki for the home team.
In the minute 78, Waasland-Beveren make their third substitution with Daan Heymans replacing Andreas Wiegel.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
